text: Next Academy Palm Beach, formerly known as Palm Beach Suns FC were an American soccer club based in Boca Raton, Florida. Founded in 2015, the team plays in USL League Two, the fourth tier of the American Soccer Pyramid. The club was purchased by Brazilian company Next Academy and renamed to Next Academy Palm Beach in December 2017.
